```diff
+        form.innerHTML = `<p style="margin:0.5rem 0 0; font-weight:600">You're in üéâ We'll email you soon.</p>`;
+        history.replaceState(null, '', location.pathname + '?joined=1');
+      } catch (err) {
+        window.location.href = '/thanks.html';
+      }
+    });
+  });
+})();
*** End Patch
```

```diff
*** Begin Patch
*** Update File: /Users/seandavey/Downloads/freestyle/index.html
@@
-  // Simple analytics tracker for mockup clicks
-  (function(){
-    const COLLECT_URL = '/.netlify/functions/collect';
-    function track(eventName, detail){
-      try{
-        navigator.sendBeacon && navigator.sendBeacon(COLLECT_URL, new Blob([JSON.stringify({event:eventName, detail, ts:Date.now(), path:location.pathname})], {type:'application/json'}));
-      }catch(e){
-        // no-op
-      }
-    }
+  // Simple analytics tracker for mockup clicks (sends to Formspree)
+  (function(){
+    const COLLECT_URL = 'https://formspree.io/f/meorpayo';
+    function track(eventName, detail){
+      try{
+        if(!navigator.sendBeacon) return;
+        const fd = new FormData();
+        fd.append('type', eventName);
+        fd.append('key', (detail && detail.key) || '');
+        fd.append('meta', JSON.stringify((detail && detail.meta) || {}));
+        fd.append('path', location.pathname);
+        fd.append('ts', String(Date.now()));
+        fd.append('_subject', 'Proxi click');
+        navigator.sendBeacon(COLLECT_URL, fd);
+      }catch(e){
+        // no-op
+      }
+    }
*** End Patch
```

Yes‚Äîclick tracking exists and I‚Äôve just wired it to Formspree so it works on Vercel.

What‚Äôs live in code now
- Both pages (`index.html` and `freestyle-october/index.html`) attach click handlers to:
  - Any `.click-overlay`
  - Any `.mock[data-track]`
- On click (and iframe-postMessage events), it sends a beacon to your Formspree form `meorpayo` with fields:
  - type: mock_click or mock_button_click
  - key: the `data-track` value (e.g., hero-mock, gallery-feed)
  - meta: JSON string of extra info (when provided from iframes)
  - path: current page path
  - ts: epoch milliseconds
  - _subject: ‚ÄúProxi click‚Äù (helps filtering)

Where to see events
- Formspree ‚Üí your ‚ÄúProxi Waitlist‚Äù form ‚Üí Submissions tab. You‚Äôll see entries with those fields.

Next steps
- Redeploy on Vercel, then click around the mockups and confirm entries show up in Formspree Submissions.
- If you want email alerts for clicks, turn on notifications in Formspree Settings.

If you prefer storing clicks separately from signups, I can point clicks to a second Formspree form ID.
